item.title: By: matt
item.dc:creator: matt
item.description: <p>the solution for the snail-link networking was a bit odd. i had to remove the xp drivers (which as the most recent i had assumed would be best) and put on the old nt4.0 drivers for my 3com network card.<br/> <br/> a bit odd but at least it seems to work. in fact it seems to be faster than when it was running under win2k.</p>
item.content:encoded:
the solution for the snail-link networking was a bit odd. i had to remove the xp drivers (which as the most recent i had assumed would be best) and put on the old nt4.0 drivers for my 3com network card.

a bit odd but at least it seems to work. in fact it seems to be faster than when it was running under win2k.

item.title: By: matt
item.dc:creator: matt
item.description: <p>the christmas site should be up and going again. let me know if there are any problems.</p>
item.content:encoded: the christmas site should be up and going again. let me know if there are any problems.

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>The site is down so I await with anticipation the section on eating out!! Thanks for the info on flights.</p>
item.content:encoded: The site is down so I await with anticipation the section on eating out!! Thanks for the info on flights.
